Title: Match Point
Overview: Chris, a former tennis player, looks for work as an instructor. He meets Tom Hewett, a wealthy young man whose sister Chloe fall in love with Chris. But Chris has his eye on Tom's fiancee Nola.
Keywords: love triangle, london england, upper class, adultery, tennis, river thames, love, wealth, lust, instructor, gold digger, social climbing, actress
Cast: Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Scarlett Johansson, Emily Mortimer
